snippet: Melvin E. Lowe was convicted of conspiring with State Senator John L. Sampson in an invoicing fraud. Mr. Sampson, under indictment on other charges, has not been charged in the case.
abstract: Melvin E Lowe, former consultant to State Sen John L Sampson, is convicted on federal corruption charges of conspiring to steal $100,000 from New York Democratic Campaign Committee in invoicing scheme; verdict comes as Sampson wins primary in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Melvin E. Lowe was convicted of conspiring with State Senator John L. Sampson in an invoicing fraud. Mr. Sampson, under indictment on other charges, has not been charged in the case.

headline.main: Ex-Consultant Found Guilty of Fraud Tied to Lawmaker
headline.print_headline: Ex-Consultant Found Guilty of Fraud Tied to Lawmaker
